headline: T-Mobile (TMUS): Assessing Valuation After Launching Its Customer Credit Card with Capital One
summary: T-Mobile US (TMUS) launched its own credit card today in partnership with Capital One, giving customers a new way to earn rewards tied directly to their wireless spending and devices. The move expands T-Mobile’s reach beyond wireless and into financial services, sparking investor interest in how this diversification could impact future growth. See our latest analysis for T-Mobile US. T-Mobile has been making waves beyond the new credit card rollout, announcing expanded partnerships and...
